title: Sacred Heart Diaries
description: Meth and absinthe sweetened with a bit of hot sugar, this modern translation exposes life behind the bedroom doors of pre-Revolutionary France.A willful noblewoman and her mothers groom, a virgin and her masked lover, a brazen temptress playing the repentant sinner, a betrayal come full circle and forbidden love.All are revealed in this modern translation exposing the decadence, hypocrisy and heartbreak of Frances well-born daughters in the final days of the Ancien Regime. Warning, this title contains the explicit sex, graphic language, BDSM, mnage a troi, violence, lesbianism and brief male-on-male scenes.
author: Ann Vremont
